snippet: Vittorio Missoni, the head of the prominent fashion house, was aboard a small plane that has disappeared, a company spokeswoman said.
abstract: Small plan carrying four Italian tourists, including Vittorio Missoni, head of Missoni fashion business, disappears off coast of Venezuela, prompting sea and air search.

byline.contributor: William Neuman contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela, and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

lead_paragraph: Vittorio Missoni, the head of the prominent fashion house, was aboard a small plane that has disappeared, a company spokeswoman said.

headline.seo: Plane Carrying Vittorio Missoni Lost Near Venezuela
headline.main: Fashion Boss From Italy Lost in Flight Off Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Fashion Boss From Italy Lost in Flight Off Venezuela
